sentences.sContent: We can define burnout as exhaustion.
sentences.sCn: 我们可以把burnout (燃尽)解释为 exhaustion (耗尽)。

sentences.sContent: Could not this very Socratic way be  a sign of collapse, exhaustion, sickness, and the dissolution of the  anarchic instinct?
sentences.sContent_eng: Could not this very Socratic way be a sign of collapse, exhaustion, sickness, and the dissolution of the anarchic instinct?
sentences.sCn: 这个非常苏格拉底式的方法不能是无法无天的天性的崩塌、耗尽、疾患和解体的一个信号？

synos.tran: 枯竭；[电子]耗尽；精疲力竭

words.tran: 使筋疲力尽的；使耗尽的
耗尽；用尽；使…精疲力尽（exhaust的过去式）
耗尽；使…精疲力竭；排出（exhaust的ing形式）
排出；耗尽；使精疲力尽；彻底探讨

trans.tranOther: when all of something has been used
